summary: Initial roadmap and backlog created for itom-chat-ui with 7 phases and 39 tickets. All 39 GitHub issues created (#1-#39) with labels. Phase 1 (Foundation) is active with 8 tickets. Next ticket: CHAT-001 (Initialize Next.js project) and CHAT-003 (FastAPI backend) can start in parallel.

next_ticket_details.title: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript and app router

recommendations: CHAT-001 and CHAT-003 have no dependencies and can be started in parallel (Next.js frontend + FastAPI backend)
CHAT-008 (TypeScript types) depends only on CHAT-001 and should be tackled early to unblock Phase 2 components
Phase 1 has 3 tickets with no dependencies (CHAT-001, CHAT-003, CHAT-008 after CHAT-001) -- maximize parallelism
